name: Milli
tagline: Leveraging todays tools to build better businesses
description:
We are a Seattle based social media & digital agency.
We believe in good business. The way we connect with others is changing everyday, which in turn is making the way we do business better, faster, and smarter. The market is as competitive as ever and the chatter as loud. Our mission is to work with brands and businesses of all sizes to reach their audiences in an authentic way.
We're people-people. From developing social media strategy for Fortune 500 companies to having launched a successful biotech start-up, we offer a diverse background within our core team. Our strategic process touches on all types of thinking and business aptitudes. Social & digital media is about people, and so are we.
READ MORE...
